about_the_game:
VTube Studio now supports online multiplayer collabs with your Steam friends, directly within the app!! Supports up to 6 people per collab. This DLC removes the 10 minute time limit and lets you run collabs for as long as you want (limit is 24 hours per collab).

With this, you can run collabs without the hassle of setting up greenscreens or laggy Discord screenshares.

It works like this:

  • All models and items are automatically encrypted and synced between collab participants in the background when you load them!
  • You can even use Live2D items (as long as they aren't too complex).
  • Movement data is sent smoothly, securely and at high FPS thanks to the Steam Data Relay network.
  • There are of course limits!! If you load multiple massively complex models, your may get some lag. You can try out VNet for free for short 10-minute collab sessions, so please do that before purchasing!!

For more info, please refer to the VTube Studio VNet wiki page with all the details.
detailed_description:
VTube Studio now supports online multiplayer collabs with your Steam friends, directly within the app!! Supports up to 6 people per collab. This DLC removes the 10 minute time limit and lets you run collabs for as long as you want (limit is 24 hours per collab).

With this, you can run collabs without the hassle of setting up greenscreens or laggy Discord screenshares.

It works like this:

  • All models and items are automatically encrypted and synced between collab participants in the background when you load them!
  • You can even use Live2D items (as long as they aren't too complex).
  • Movement data is sent smoothly, securely and at high FPS thanks to the Steam Data Relay network.
  • There are of course limits!! If you load multiple massively complex models, your may get some lag. You can try out VNet for free for short 10-minute collab sessions, so please do that before purchasing!!

For more info, please refer to the VTube Studio VNet wiki page with all the details.
legal_notice: This app is an indie production and is not developed by Live2D Inc., but is officially licensed to use the Live2D Cubism SDK.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: VNet is VTube Studio's built-in multiplayer collab system!! Just select the collab participants, load your model and you're ready to go!!
